ingredients.ingredient: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces

cookingTips: Let chicken pieces come to room temperature before frying for more even cooking throughout
Use a heavy cast-iron skillet or Dutch oven for optimal heat retention and even browning
Fry at 325°F for 12-15 minutes per side; internal temperature should reach 165°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the cook on the classic Southern technique: maintaining proper oil temperature, not crowding the pan, and achieving a golden, crispy exterior with moist meat.
